description: Hellenic states provided shields to their standing armies at great cost. Only the most celebrated soldiers had shields faced with silver, as did the famous 'Silver Shields' regiment in Alexander the Great's army. Others, like the Spartans, provided a state-issued shield to their soldiers upon completing the rigorous Spartan military training regimen, The Agoge.
requirementsTooltip: Unlocked in City Phase. Requires Forging or Metallurgy
tooltip: Champions +2 pierce armor, but also +10 coin Cost.
